meanings.sent1: The mapmakers carefully drew the boundaries of the new city map.
meanings.sent2: The mapmakers used advanced technology to create a detailed map of the mountain range.
meanings.sent3: The mapmakers joked that they could find their way out of any maze with their map-making skills.
meanings.sent4: The mapmakers were like modern-day explorers, uncovering hidden treasures on their maps.
meanings.sent5: The mapmakers' dedication to accuracy made their maps invaluable to travelers.

meanings.definition: Those who create visual representations of geographical areas.
meanings.sent1: The mapmakers displayed their latest work at the geography conference.
meanings.sent2: Many mapmakers use satellite images to accurately depict different terrains.
meanings.sent3: The mapmakers' creativity knew no bounds as they crafted stunning maps of fictional lands.
meanings.sent4: The mapmakers' artistry transformed blank paper into vibrant depictions of the world.
meanings.sent5: The mapmakers' attention to detail brought the landscapes to life on their maps.
